creator: miyoshikensho
title: blimpix
description: A small blimp is created using a balloon and a simple gondola. The gondola houses a motor, propeller, microcomputer (Arduino Pro Mini), LEDs, an ultrasonic sensor, and a battery. The blimp ascends by rotating the propeller and descends by its own weight. The ultrasonic sensor detects the distance from the ground, turning off the motor and LEDs when the blimp reaches a certain height and turning them back on upon reaching the ground, creating a repeating cycle of motion.
steps: Construct a simple gondola that can be easily attached to a balloon.
Equip the gondola with a small motor, propeller, microcomputer (Arduino Pro Mini), LEDs, an ultrasonic sensor, and a battery.
Program the microcomputer to control the motor and LEDs based on input from the ultrasonic sensor.
The blimp ascends by rotating its propeller.
The ultrasonic sensor detects the distance between the ground and the blimp.
When the blimp reaches a certain height, the ultrasonic sensor signals the microcomputer to turn off the motor and LEDs.
The blimp descends by its own weight.
When the blimp reaches the ground, the ultrasonic sensor signals the microcomputer to turn on the motor and LEDs, restarting the cycle.
